echo "Busybox build complete"

set -e

cd /mnt/anvil_temp/ascii_oss/src/linux-6.6.14

# Load default config

echo 'CONFIG_BLK_DEV_LOOP=y' >> .config
echo 'CONFIG_BLK_DEV_INITRD=y' >> .config

# Save config
make olddefconfig

echo "Kernel configuration complete"

{"path": "/mnt/anvil_temp/busybox_config_patch.sh", "content": "#!/bin/bash
set -e

cd /mnt/busybox-1.36.1

# Enable static linking in the Busybox configuration
sed -i 's/# CONFIG_STATIC is not set/CONFIG_STATIC=y/' .config

# Verify the change
grep CONFIG_STATIC .config

exit 0
"}

{"path": "/mnt/anvil_temp/isolinux.cfg", "content": "DEFAULT menu.c32
PROMPT 0
TIMEOUT 50

MENU TITLE AnvilOS Boot Menu

LABEL menu.c32
  MENU LABEL Boot AnvilOS
  KERNEL /boot/vmlinuz
  APPEND root=/dev/sda2 ro init=/init quiet

LABEL hdd
  MENU LABEL Boot from Hard Drive
  LOCALBOOT 0x80

LABEL reboot
  MENU LABEL Reboot
  COM32 reboot.c32

LABEL poweroff
  MENU LABEL Power Off
  COM32 poweroff.c32"}

{"path": "/mnt/anvil_temp/busybox_config_patch.sh", "content": "#!/bin/bash
set -e

# Find the line containing 'CONFIG_STATIC is not set'
line=$(grep -n 'CONFIG_STATIC is not set' /mnt/rootfs/busybox-1.36.1/.config)

# Extract the line number
line_number=$(echo "$line" | cut -d':' -f1)

# If the line number is found, replace the line with 'CONFIG_STATIC=y'
if [ -n "$line_number" ]; then
  sed -i "${line_number}s/.*/CONFIG_STATIC=y/" /mnt/rootfs/busybox-1.36.1/.config
else
  echo "CONFIG_STATIC is not set line not found in .config" >&2
  exit 1
fi

# Verify the change
grep 'CONFIG_STATIC=y' /mnt/rootfs/busybox-1.36.1/.config

exit 0
"}

{"path": "/mnt/anvil_temp/busybox_config_patch.diff", "content": "--- a/config/defconfig
+++ b/config/defconfig
-CONFIG_TC=y
# CONFIG_TC is not set"}
